Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Southbound Reroute near Stony Island/83rd
ShortDescription: Southbound 28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, Anthony, 87th and Stony Island due to street blockage near Stony Island/83rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, Anthony, 87th and Stony Island due to street blockage near Stony Island/83rd.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #47 47th Temporary Reroute at 47th/Cicero
